name: Soul Searching (itch) (rainydey, Staintocton)
description:
• WASD to move.
  • Shift to dodge.
  • Mouse1 to shoot. 
  • Your enemies charge you up with their spirits. Dodge to discharge

Fight your way back to your body as a possessed cultist. Use your fallen enemies spirits as power.

Rainydey - Code

blanketc - art

Staintocton - music and sfx
